title: Misch Kohn Retrospective
description: This exhibit was Misch Kohn’s first retrospective, although he had shown in museums all over the world beforehand. Kohn’s work was largely realized through printmaking, although he played with painting from time to time. In the show, his etchings, lithographs, and wood engravings from over twenty years or work were put on view. At the time of the exhibit, Kohn was an associate professor of Industrial Design at the Illinois Institute of Technology.
